title: Why are new Bollywood movie directors screwing up old classic songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply because few of the initial releases were a hit and once in a while, songs like ‘Laila O Laila’ and ‘Tamma Tamma’ turn out to be instant hits ( Although, I’m not a big fan of it ). That said, there will be a threshold to this trend and the makers will realise this soon.
